code: var dateBuilder=function dateBuilder(d){var months=["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"];var days=["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"];var day=days[d.getDay()];var date=d.getDate();var month=months[d.getMonth()];var year=d.getFullYear();return"".concat(day," ").concat(date," ").concat(month," ").concat(year);};export default dateBuilder;
